casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Johnson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Johnson, 105 Ohio St.3d 132, 2005-Ohio-786.]

(No. 2004-0690 Submitted February 16, 2005 Decided March 16, 2005.) E. Michael Pfeifer, Wyandot County Prosecuting Attorney, and Jonathan K. Miller, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. David H. Bodiker, State Public Defender, and Angie Greene, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. White, 103 Ohio St.3d 580, 2004-Ohio-5989, 817 N.E.2d 393.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur;
